Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'background_color': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='#00000000'), 'character': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='lisa'), 'pose': FieldInfo(annotation=AzureAvatarPose, required=False, default=<AzureAvatarPose.SITTING: 'sitting'>), 'style': FieldInfo(annotation=AzureAvatarStyle, required=False, default=<AzureAvatarStyle.GRACEFUL: 'graceful'>), 'video_codec': FieldInfo(annotation=VideoCodecs, required=False, default=<VideoCodecs.VP9: 'vp9'>), 'video_format': FieldInfo(annotation=VideoFormat, required=False, default=<VideoFormat.WEBM: 'webm'>), 'voice': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='en-IN-NeerjaNeural')}¶

Metadata about the fields defined on the model, mapping of field names to [FieldInfo][pydantic.fields.FieldInfo].

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.
